    • Constructor Detail

      • Token

        public Token(processing.core.PImage img,
             int x,
             int y)
        Creates a new instance of a Token object having its left corner at the inputed (x, y) coordinates with a specified width and height.
        Parameters:
        img - The PImage which the Token will look like in the game (sprite).
        x - The X value of the Token's top left corner.
        y - The Y value of the Token's top left corner.

    • Method Detail

      • applyWindowLimits

        public void applyWindowLimits(int windowWidth,
                              int windowHeight)
        Sets the minimum and maximum x and y coordinates the Token can have according to the window size.
        Parameters:
        windowWidth - The width of the window.
        windowHeight - The height of the window.
